leader.name: leader
leader.desc: Capable of bringing people together to accomplish great deeds.

sociopath.name: sociopath
sociopath.desc: Will lie, steal and kill at a moment's notice.

kind.name: kind
kind.desc: Will act selflessly and generously to help others.

bulky.name: bulky
bulky.desc: Capable of both delivering and resisting stronger attacks.

devious.name: devious
devious.desc: Will manipulate and betray others if given the chance.

seductive.name: seductive
seductive.desc: Capable of romancing others into doing their bidding.

cute.name: cute
cute.desc: Everybody likes them! Others may go out of their way to protect them.

annoying.name: annoying
annoying.desc: Horrible to be around. Tends to get killed off first.

survivalist.name: survivalist
survivalist.desc: Strives better alone, and will not let others get in their way.

rich.name: rich
rich.desc: Armed with a large fortune to cater every whim.

inventor.name: inventor
inventor.desc: Can devise strange machines for various purposes.

lunatic.name: lunatic
lunatic.desc: Susceptible to gain and lose random perks regularly.

medic.name: medic
medic.desc: Knows how to treat illness and injury while preserving life.

marksmen.name: marksmen
marksmen.desc: Perceptive and steady handed, skilled at range weapons.

animal ken.name: animal ken
animal ken.desc: One with the natural world, animals are drawn to them.

ninja.name: ninja
ninja.desc: Believes they are a ninja of great finesse, one with the darkness.

stubborn.name: stubborn
stubborn.desc: Very strong willed. Will not give up for better or worse.

analytical.name: analytical
analytical.desc: Prone to thinking through problems and intelectual persuits.

artist.name: artist
artist.desc: Creatively inclined and can be unpredictable.

pyromania.name: pyromania
pyromania.desc: Likes fire, like, really likes fire.

cowardly.name: cowardly
cowardly.desc: Will avoid direct conflict and hide from danger.

glasses.name: glasses
glasses.desc: Wears glasses to compensate for their poor eyesight.

clumsy.name: clumsy
clumsy.desc: Prone to injury and dropping things.

the gift.name: the gift
the gift.desc: Has a rare supernatural talent and is attracted to the strange.

plot armor.name: plot armor
plot armor.desc: This character is almost impossible to kill. Not for serious games.

nerd.name: nerd
nerd.desc: Filled to the brim with obscure knowledge and technical gossips.

hypersomniac.name: hypersomniac
hypersomniac.desc: Might just fall asleep at any moment.

frenzied.name: frenzied
frenzied.desc: Experiencing a fit of violent rage and, when met with trouble, an incredible surge of adrenaline.

shell-shocked.name: shell-shocked
shell-shocked.desc: Has seen too much. May not be of much use for a while.

dazed.name: dazed
dazed.desc: Not quite in full control of their faculties. May wander off unpredictably.

heroic.name: heroic
heroic.desc: Having a moment of heroism. Resolved and unstoppable.

determined.name: determined
determined.desc: Set to give their all, whatever the cost.

revived.name: revived
revived.desc: Was just resurrected through some miracle or other.

set trap.name: set trap
set trap.desc: Laid down some traps that others may get caught in...

mint enhanced.name: mint enhanced
mint enhanced.desc: Has successfully swallowed a mint essence, gaining immunity to all magical attacks.

fallen.name: fallen
fallen.desc: Has fallen to the ground and can't get back up...

fortified.name: fortified
fortified.desc: In a very defensive stance, but can't really do much else.

embedded.name: embedded
embedded.desc: Warning: DO NOT remove sharp object embedded in vital arteries.

vulnerable.name: vulnerable
vulnerable.desc: No matter what you wear, it still hurts...

immaterial.name: immaterial
immaterial.desc: Does not possess a directly interactable physical form.

paralyzed.name: paralyzed
paralyzed.desc: For whatever reason, none of your muscles want to listen anymore.

ignorable.name: ignorable
ignorable.desc: No one really takes notice of them.

coupled.name: coupled
coupled.desc: Horizontal and vertical position locked to the partner.

ancient charging.name: ancient charging
ancient charging.desc: Your Ancient scepter is charging up!

snake climbing.name: snake climbing
snake climbing.desc: You are climbing on a snake!

grieving.name: grieving
grieving.desc: Grieving about the loss of a good friend.

wolves' mark.name: wolves' mark
wolves' mark.desc: Attracting the attention of nearby wolves.

mark of the void.name: mark of the void
mark of the void.desc: You feel an evil presence watching you...

turtle.name: turtle
turtle.desc: A cute turtle to do its owner's bidding.

wolf.name: wolf
wolf.desc: A fierce wolf to help its owner defeat the enemies.

hawk.name: hawk
hawk.desc: A vigilant hawk to watch over the world with its owner.

tiger.name: tiger
tiger.desc: A hungry tiger to tear its owner's enemies to shreds.

phantasmal dragon.name: phantasmal dragon
phantasmal dragon.desc: A nice ethereal dragon to brutally and painfully atomize your enemies into a quadrillion fragments.

heavenly hypercane.name: heavenly hypercane
heavenly hypercane.desc: Let fate befall upon the unlucky one.

scratched.name: scratched
scratched.desc: Lightly scratched and bleeding a little bit.

crippled.name: crippled
crippled.desc: Been pounded to the point of immobility.

lacerated.name: lacerated
lacerated.desc: Received a lot of slicing damage, and it really hurts.

bleeding out.name: bleeding out
bleeding out.desc: Losing blood at an alarming rate. Needs immediate treatment.

singed.name: singed
singed.desc: Mildly burned and in some pain.

seared.name: seared
seared.desc: Has received some bad burns, but it is still somewhat manageable.

burnt.name: burnt
burnt.desc: Singed quite a lot. Everything hurts.

badly poisoned.name: badly poisoned
badly poisoned.desc: Bloodstream saturated with poison; will most likely die soon.

trapped.name: trapped
trapped.desc: Stuck in a trap, and waiting to be freed, if something doesn't kill them first.

unconscious.name: unconscious
unconscious.desc: Not quite comatose, but almost there.

comatose.name: comatose
comatose.desc: Unconscious, and unable to speak or move.

ghost.name: ghost
ghost.desc: Brought back from the dead in a mischievous incorporeal form.

zombie.name: zombie
zombie.desc: Brought back from the dead in a smelly, mindless form.

sheep.name: sheep
sheep.desc: Has been turned into a sheep through some magical mean.

duck.name: duck
duck.desc: Has been turned into a duck by a magical incantation.

dizzy.name: dizzy
dizzy.desc: Has suffered recent head trauma making it harder to think.

broken.name: broken
broken.desc: Something's broken, but its not an arm or a leg.

shot.name: shot
shot.desc: Has been shot by an arrow or bullet.

bitten.name: bitten
bitten.desc: Becoming a zombie isn't infectious, right?

gremlin.name: gremlin
gremlin.desc: Has gone into gremlin mode, causing chaos everywhere.

act again.name: act again
act again.desc: Act another time in the same round!

fleed.name: fleed
fleed.desc: Has managed to successfully flee from combat!

confirmed.name: confirmed
confirmed.desc: Has been confirmed to not be mostly dead.

big stick.name: big stick
big stick.desc: Rather crude, but can bash an unsuspecting enemy just fine.

pitchfork.name: pitchfork
pitchfork.desc: Used to stack hay and stab your friends.

sword.name: sword
sword.desc: A classic bladed weapon popular since medieval times.

axe.name: axe
axe.desc: Makes quick, if messy work of anyone who'd stand in your way.

handgun.name: handgun
handgun.desc: Takes down a target quite reliably if you know how to aim.

grenade.name: grenade
grenade.desc: A single-use explosive device to blow several enemies to bits.

slingshot.name: slingshot
slingshot.desc: Fires small projectiles. Not quite deadly as much as slightly annoying.

bow.name: bow
bow.desc: Its arrows can easily chop a head clean off from a distance if skillfully wielded.

flamethrower.name: flamethrower
flamethrower.desc: Careful! May set both foes and friends on fire.

rocket launcher.name: rocket launcher
rocket launcher.desc: A dangerous weapon; excels at blowing stuff up.

lasergun.name: lasergun
lasergun.desc: Ultra-concentrated energy shots that burn through practically anything.

magic wand.name: magic wand
magic wand.desc: Casts a variety of spells upon your friends and foes.

ancient scepter.name: ancient scepter
ancient scepter.desc: Calls forth ancient beings, hexes, and curses on your adversaries.

pet wolf.name: pet wolf
pet wolf.desc: A ravenous pet wolf to devour your opponents.

pet tiger.name: pet tiger
pet tiger.desc: A fierce pet tiger to tear your opponents to shreds.

pet turtle.name: pet turtle
pet turtle.desc: A steady pet turtle to slowly but surely win the race.

wish ring.name: wish ring
wish ring.desc: Will unpredictably respond to wishes in dire situations.

pet hawk.name: pet hawk
pet hawk.desc: A cunning pet hawk to spy from the skies above.

pet rock.name: pet rock
pet rock.desc: A classic pet rock to teach tons of neat tricks.

cursed knife.name: cursed knife
cursed knife.desc: May force it's user into unspeakable things.

lucky coin.name: lucky coin
lucky coin.desc: Will bless the user with good fortune, if they're already lucky enough to have it.

random orb.name: random orb
random orb.desc: Eventually will turn into something else, or cause strange things to happen.

medicine.name: medicine
medicine.desc: Any medicine can be a poison with a large enough dose.

first aid kit.name: first aid kit
first aid kit.desc: Extremely valuable to saving lives, if someone is still alive to be saved.

tourniquet.name: tourniquet
tourniquet.desc: You might lose a limb, but you won't lose your life.

AED.name: AED
AED.desc: Can potentially bring back someone who was thought dead.

bikini.name: bikini
bikini.desc: Quite alluring, but not much help in combat situations.

dapper suit.name: dapper suit
dapper suit.desc: Turns anyone into a snappy dresser.

parka.name: parka
parka.desc: Keeps you protected from the elements and, you suppose, some of the wimpier physical attacks.

knight armor.name: knight armor
knight armor.desc: Excellent physical protection, but heavy and uncomfortable.

combat gear.name: combat gear
combat gear.desc: Used by military forces. Provides near-perfect protection from all but the deadliest attacks.

wizard robe.name: wizard robe
wizard robe.desc: Can greatly amplify magic powers. Comes with a pointy hat.

kevlar vest.name: kevlar vest
kevlar vest.desc: Can help you survive bullets, but they still hurt.

kite shield.name: kite shield
kite shield.desc: A shield great for deflecting weapons and protecting others.

riot shield.name: riot shield
riot shield.desc: A shield great for deflecting bullets and protecting others.

scrap metal.name: scrap metal
scrap metal.desc: A bunch of is mostly useless chunks of metal.

gun parts.name: gun parts
gun parts.desc: A variety of gun parts with no manual for reassembly.

magic dust.name: magic dust
magic dust.desc: Sparkles like glitter. Is twice as hard to wash away.

roll of fabric.name: roll of fabric
roll of fabric.desc: Thick rolls of fabric, a literal canvas to work with.

batch of cookies.name: batch of cookies
batch of cookies.desc: Can be consumed multiple times to rid oneself of ailments. Delicious!

hot chocolate.name: hot chocolate
hot chocolate.desc: Can be consumed multiple times to heal oneself of injuries.

extreme cinnamon soda.name: extreme cinnamon soda
extreme cinnamon soda.desc: Can be consumed to enter an invincible frenzy.

mint essence.name: mint essence
mint essence.desc: Can be consumed to gain immunity to all curses, but is rather difficult to swallow.

vanilla ice cream.name: vanilla ice cream
vanilla ice cream.desc: The compellment to acquire this item is unparalleled.

cookie dough.name: cookie dough
cookie dough.desc: Can be consumed, or be baked into a proper batch of cookies. Premature consumption may lead to sickness.

panacea pellet.name: panacea pellet
panacea pellet.desc: A highly magical pellet that cures literally everything at once - including death itself.

snake charmer's flute.name: snake charmer's flute
snake charmer's flute.desc: Calls forth a snake to ascend upwards indefinitely.

respawn anchor.name: respawn anchor
respawn anchor.desc: Respawn! Note: might cause deaths via [INTENTIONAL GAME DESIGN].

freezing sapphire.name: freezing sapphire
freezing sapphire.desc: Can be thrown to freeze everyone.

high pressure garden hose.name: high pressure garden hose
high pressure garden hose.desc: Good at knocking people over, not so good for killing people.
